remarks: Transform a product region using the converse operation.  (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 1-Feb-2018.)
statement:
fprodcnv.1 $e |- ( x = <. j , k >. -> B = D ) $.
fprodcnv.2 $e |- ( y = <. k , j >. -> C = D ) $.
fprodcnv.3 $e |- ( ph -> A e. Fin ) $.
fprodcnv.4 $e |- ( ph -> Rel A ) $.
fprodcnv.5 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. A ) -> B e. CC ) $.
fprodcnv $p |- ( ph -> prod_ x e. A B = prod_ y e. `' A C ) $.
$d A x y $.
$d B j k y $.
$d C j k $.
$d D x y $.
$d j k x y $.
$d ph x y $.
